players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Bob was murdered by Charlie, I have evidence."
Diana: "Bob was a good guy, I don't think he deserved to die. We need to figure out who killed him."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso, and I killed Bob. Alice has no evidence against me."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
